name: Slime.cut
description:
A fast-paced chaotic game that will leave you cursing other players!

Slime.cut is a local multiplayer video game where players play as slimes who have escaped the laboratory where they were created. Take on the role of a mischevious slime as they navigate their way out of the laboratory and into the real world. Battle other players by strategically cutting holes as a result of your acidic body, race each other for powerups that give you certain buffs and take part in the chaos that ensues!

The mechanics for Slime.cut is is greatly inspired by games like Hole.io and Donut County. The style of the game is inspired by low-poly fun like Human Fall Flat, Pummel Party and Slime Rancher. 

Reviews

"A Very Cool Game - The best game I've ever played in my life." - The Developers Probably

"Fun! - Very chaotic!" - A Random Classmate

"Such a cute game! - A very fun game!! I'm not very good but I like playing it!" - My Mom

"I'm so tired - This was six months of my life." - One Of The Developers
